SELECT ITEM_NO, SELLER_ID, TYPE, TO_CHAR(ADD_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as ADD_TIME, TITLE, CONTENT, PRICE, STOCK, PIC, PIC_D FROM ITEM WHERE TYPE = #{type} AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT S.NIC_NAME, I.ITEM_NO, I.SELLER_ID, I.TYPE, TO_CHAR(I.ADD_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ADD_TIME, I.TITLE, I.CONTENT, I.PRICE, I.STOCK, I.PIC, I.PIC_D, I.CONTENT_D FROM SELLER S , ITEM I WHERE S.SELLER_ID = I.SELLER_ID AND ITEM_NO = #{no}
SELECT ITEM_NO, SELLER_ID, TYPE, TO_CHAR(ADD_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as ADD_TIME, TITLE, CONTENT, PRICE, STOCK, PIC, PIC_D FROM ITEM WHERE SELLER_ID = #{seller_id} ORDER BY 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (CART_NO, ITEM_NO, MEM_ID, QUANTITY) VALUES( CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{item_no} , #{mem_id} , #{quantity} )
mapper.select: SELECT I.TITLE, I.PIC, C.CART_NO, C.ITEM_NO, C.MEM_ID, C.QUANTITY, I.PRICE, (I.PRICE * C.QUANTITY) AS TOTAL FROM CART C , ITEM I WHERE C.ITEM_NO = I.ITEM_NO AND MEM_ID = #{id} ORDER BY 3
mapper.update: UPDATE CART SET QUANTITY = #{quantity} WHERE CART_NO = #{cart_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BUYER( BUY_NO, MEM_ID, PAYMENT, PAY_TIME, NAME, PHONE, ADDR_NO, ADDR, ADDR_D, EMAIL) VALUES( #{buy_no} , #{mem_id} , #{payment} , LOCALTIMESTAMP , #{name} , #{phone} , #{addr_no} , #{addr} , #{addr_d} , #{email} )
INSERT INTO BUYER_D(BUYD_NO, BUY_NO, ITEM_NO, QUANTITY) VALUES( ORDER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{buy_no} , #{item_no} , #{quantity} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ITEM SET STOCK = #{stock} WHERE ITEM_NO = #{item_no}
mapper.select: SELECT D.ITEM_NO, D.QUANTITY, D.BUY_NO, B.PAYMENT, I.TITLE, I.PIC , (I.PRICE*D.QUANTITY) AS PRICE, D.BUYD_NO FROM BUYER_D D , BUYER B, ITEM I WHERE D.BUY_NO = B.BUY_NO AND D.ITEM_NO = I.ITEM_NO AND D.BUY_NO = #{buy_no}
